src:
Ini Serangkaian Uji Coba LRT Jabodebek Sebelum Resmi Beroperasi
07 Nov 2019, 09:27 by Nurcholis Maarif


Foto: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Menteri Perhubungan Budi Karya Sumadi memastikan 31 kereta LRT Jabodebek yang direncanakan beroperasi akhir 2021 akan melakukan serangkaian uji coba. Kereta yang baru didatangkan PT INKA (Persero) ini akan melakukan uji pertama, yaitu factory test atau uji pabrik."Proses uji coba sebelum pengoperasian LRT memang kita lakukan lebih lama sekitar satu tahun karena kita belajar dari pengalaman pembangunan LRT Sumsel. Ini dilakukan agar hasilnya lebih optimal," jelas Budi dalam keterangan tertulis, Kamis (7/11/2019).Setelah melakukan factory test, kata Budi, rangkaian kereta LRT Jabodebek akan diuji 3 fase lanjutan di antaranya system test pada September 2020 hingga Januari 2021, system integration test pada Februari 2021 hingga Agustus 2021, dan system acceptance test pada Agustus 2021. Berdasarkan data dari Ditjen Perkeretaapian Kemenhub, sampai dengan saat ini, progres total pembangunan prasarana sudah mencapai 66,79% dengan rincian pembangunan progres fisik lintas pelayanan Cawang-Cibubur 85,93%, Cawang-Dukuh Atas 57,66%, dan Cawang-Bekasi Timur 59,94%. "Kita berharap proses uji coba berjalan dengan lancar agar moda transportasi yang 60% lebih merupakan produk karya anak bangsa ini dapat segera dimanfaatkan dan menjadi angkutan massal yang diandalkan," pungkas Budi.Simak Video "Asyik! November 2019, LRT Siap Beroprasi"[Gambas:Video 20detik](ujm/ujm)
text:
This Is A Series of Jabodebek LRT Trials Before Officially Operating
Nov 7 2019, 09:27 by Nurcholis Maarif


Photo: Grandyos Zafna

Jakarta - Transportation Minister Budi Karya Sumadi ensured 31 Jabodebek LRT trains planned to be operational by the end of 2021 will conduct a series of trials. The new train brought by PT INKA (Persero) will conduct the first test, which is a factory test or factory test. "The trial process before LRT operation is indeed carried out for about a year because we learn from the experience of the South Sumatra LRT development. This is done so that the results more optimal, "explained Budi in a written statement, Thursday (11/07/2019). After conducting a factory test, said Budi, the Jabodebek LRT train series will be tested in 3 advanced phases including the system test in September 2020 to January 2021, the system integration test in February 2021 to August 2021, and the acceptance test system in August 2021. Based on data from the Directorate General of Railways of the Ministry of Transportation, to date, the total progress of infrastructure development has reached 66.79% with details of the physical progress of the Cawang-Cibubur cross-service development 85.93 %, Cawang-Dukuh Atas 57.66%, and Cawang-Bekasi Timur 59.94%. "We hope that the trial process runs smoothly so that the transportation modes which are more than 60% the products of the nation's children can be immediately utilized and become reliable mass transportation," concluded Budi. Watch Video "Fun! November 2019, LRT is Ready to Operate" [Gambas : Video 20s] (ujm / ujm)
